text.div:
DeviceMetricOperationalStatus

Describes the operational status of the DeviceMetric.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/metric-operational-status defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
on OnThe DeviceMetric is operating and will generate DeviceObservations.
off OffThe DeviceMetric is not operating.
standby StandbyThe DeviceMetric is operating, but will not generate any DeviceObservations.

name: DeviceMetricOperationalStatus
description: Describes the operational status of the DeviceMetric.

concept.definition: The DeviceMetric is operating and will generate DeviceObservations.
The DeviceMetric is operating, but will not generate any DeviceObservations.
